DTS:Executable.DTS:refId: Package\Actualizar Cobertura en H_ORD_AMB_DET y H_ORD_INT_DET
DTS:Executable.DTS:ObjectName: Actualizar Cobertura en H_ORD_AMB_DET y H_ORD_INT_DET
DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
/* Actualiza Cobertura en Medicamentos. */
DECLARE @Periodo Int SET @Periodo = (select MAX(id_periodo) from AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA)
-- Ambulatorio. UPDATE H_ORD_AMB_DET SET porcentaje_cobertura_cons = C.porcentaje_cobertura FROM H_ORD_AMB_DET M JOIN AUX_H_CONSUMOS_MEDICAMENTOS_COBERTURA C on M.nro_cursograma = C.nro_cursograma and M.nro_lote = C.nro_lote and M.nro_secuencia = C.nro_secuencia JOIN D_PRODUCTOS P on M.id_producto = P.id_producto WHERE M.id_periodo = @Periodo and M.id_producto <> 18 and id_marca_valorizacion in ('P') and id_reintegro in ('F','R') and P.id_clase_producto in ('S')
-- Internaciones. UPDATE H_ORD_INT_DET SET porcentaje_cobertura_cons = C.porcentaje_cobertura FROM H_ORD_INT_DET M JOIN AUX_H_CONSUMOS_MEDICAMENTOS_COBERTURA C on M.nro_cursograma = C.nro_cursograma and M.nro_lote = C.nro_lote and M.nro_secuencia = C.nro_secuencia JOIN D_PRODUCTOS P on M.id_producto = P.id_producto WHERE M.id_periodo = @Periodo and M.id_producto <> 18 and id_marca_valorizacion in ('P') and id_reintegro in ('F','R') and P.id_clase_producto in ('S')

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.

properties.property:
SELECT CUENUM, CUELNU, CUESEC, CUEPRP, CUECOD, C.CUC_FRE
FROM DESARROLLO.CUP008E P
JOIN DESARROLLO.CUP004 C ON C.CUC_NUM=P.CUENUM and C.BCP_COD=P.CUECOD
join DESARROLLO.CUP008 O ON P.CUENUM=O.CUC_NUM and P.CUELNU=O.LOT_NUM and P.CUESEC=O.CUP_SEC
JOIN SMPDATD.M124FPROV D on C.CUC_ACC = D.W_PV_NPRO
WHERE CUP_TOR <> 4 and C.CUC_FRE >= ? and C.CUC_FRE < ? and CUP_TNO in ('ME','M1') and CUP_SRV <> 18 and CUP_IMP <> 0

property.description: The variable that contains the SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommandVariable

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: The mappings between the parameters in the SQL command and variables.
property.name: ParameterMapping

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
DECLARE @PeriodoDesde VARCHAR(8), @PeriodoHasta VARCHAR(8), @OPENQUERY nvarchar(4000), @TSQL nvarchar(4000), @Servidor nvarchar(4000), @Query nvarchar(4000) SET @Servidor = 'AS400' SET @PeriodoDesde = ? SET @PeriodoHasta = ? SET @OPENQUERY = 'INSERT INTO AUX_H_CONSUMOS_MEDICAMENTOS_COBERTURA (fecha_recepcion, nro_cursograma, nro_lote, nro_secuencia, porcentaje_cobertura, codigo_barra_prestacion) SELECT CUC_FRE, CUENUM, CUELNU, CUESEC, CUEPRP, CUECOD FROM OPENQUERY('+ @Servidor + ',''' SET @TSQL = 'SELECT C.CUC_FRE, CUENUM, CUELNU, CUESEC, CUEPRP, CUECOD FROM DESARROLLO.CUP008E P JOIN DESARROLLO.CUP004 C ON C.CUC_NUM=P.CUENUM and C.BCP_COD=P.CUECOD join DESARROLLO.CUP008 O ON P.CUENUM=O.CUC_NUM and P.CUELNU=O.LOT_NUM and P.CUESEC=O.CUP_SEC JOIN SMPDATD.M124FPROV D on C.CUC_ACC = D.W_PV_NPRO WHERE CUP_TOR <> 4 and C.CUC_FRE >= '+@PeriodoDesde+' and C.CUC_FRE < '+@PeriodoHasta+' and CUP_TNO in (''''ME'''',''''M1'''') and CUP_SRV <> 18 and CUP_IMP <> 0'')'
SET @Query = @OPENQUERY+@TSQL exec (@Query)

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource: select top 1 CAST(id_periodo as CHAR(6))+'01' as Periodo_Desde from AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource: select top 1 CAST(dbo.PeriodoSiguiente(CAST(CAST(id_periodo as CHAR(6))+'01' as datetime)) as CHAR(6))+'01' as Periodo_Hasta from AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA
